scripts.db:create: psql -d footfinder -f data/seeding/structure.sql && npm run db:views && npm run db:functions
scripts.db:functions: psql -d footfinder -f data/functions/scout.sql && psql -d footfinder -f data/functions/player.sql && psql -d footfinder -f data/functions/match.sql && psql -d footfinder -f data/functions/statistics.sql
scripts.db:views: psql -d footfinder -f data/views/player.sql && psql -d footfinder -f data/views/scout.sql && psql -d footfinder -f data/views/statistics.sql && psql -d footfinder -f data/views/team.sql && psql -d footfinder -f data/views/match.sql
scripts.db:seeding: psql -d footfinder -f data/seeding/seeding.sql && psql -d footfinder -f data/seeding/seeding.fakers.sql
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:create && npm run db:seeding
